p: p-Cymene is an aromatic monoterpene occurring in high levels in the essential oil from Schizogyne sericea (L.f.) DC [ 36] and functions as precursors of phenolics as thymol and carvacrol [ 37, 38, 39, 40]. It is a strong perturbator of cell membrane and can synergize the effects of other active compounds, such as ascaridole [ 26, 38, 39, 40].
